io.grpc.transport.okhttp

Class OkHttpChannelBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.grpc.AbstractChannelBuilder<OkHttpChannelBuilder>
      • io.grpc.transport.okhttp.OkHttpChannelBuilder

  • public final class OkHttpChannelBuilder
extends AbstractChannelBuilder<OkHttpChannelBuilder>
    Convenience class for building channels with the OkHttp transport.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class io.grpc.AbstractChannelBuilder

        AbstractChannelBuilder.ChannelEssentials

    • Method Detail

      • forAddress

        public static OkHttpChannelBuilder forAddress(String host,
                                              int port)
        Creates a new builder for the given server host and port.

      • transportExecutor

        public OkHttpChannelBuilder transportExecutor(ExecutorService executor)
        Override the default executor necessary for internal transport use.

        The channel does not take ownership of the given executor. It is the caller' responsibility to shutdown the executor when appropriate.

      • overrideHostForAuthority

        public OkHttpChannelBuilder overrideHostForAuthority(String host)
        Overrides the host used with TLS and HTTP virtual hosting. It does not change what host is actually connected to.

        Should only used by tests.

      • sslSocketFactory

        public OkHttpChannelBuilder sslSocketFactory(SSLSocketFactory factory)
        Provides a SSLSocketFactory to establish a secure connection.

      • setConnectionSpec

        public OkHttpChannelBuilder setConnectionSpec(ConnectionSpec connectionSpec)
        For secure connection, provides a ConnectionSpec to specify Cipher suite and TLS versions.

        By default OkHttpClientTransport.DEFAULT_CONNECTION_SPEC will be used.

      • buildEssentials

        protected AbstractChannelBuilder.ChannelEssentials buildEssentials()
        Specified by:
        buildEssentials in class AbstractChannelBuilder<OkHttpChannelBuilder>
